Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui

Contains classes and interfaces that are used to create and display the user interface for a game of Sprouts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Snapshooter
    A Snapshooter is a "camera" that takes "pictures" (Snapshots).
    Snapshot
    A Snapshot is a "picture" of the game board.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeforeMove
    This Snapshot represents the game board before a Move is being drawn.
    GameBoard
    The Sprouts game board.
    MoveDrawing
    This Snapshot represents the game board while a Move is being drawn.
    ResetDialog
    A "New game" button's InputListener.
    SproutAdd
    This Snapshot represents the game board after a Move is drawn, indicating that a sprout can be added anywhere on the Move.
    TouchEventSnapshooter
    A TouchEventSnapshooter is a special kind of "camera" that takes "pictures" of the game board state on every touch event.

Package com.github.glusk2.sprouts.core.ui Description

Contains classes and interfaces that are used to create and display the user interface for a game of Sprouts.
